attributes.additional_details: In the last year our emergency services have worked tirelessly to make us well or keep us safe and they deserve much more than a 1% pay rise or in some cases nothing at all. It is an insult to the lives lost from frontline workers and a shameful insult to them all
attributes.background:
I would like the government to recognise the hard work and dedication shown by our nurses and doctors during a year which nobody foreseen.
The public showed their appreciation by standing on their doorsteps and clapping for the NHS , government should show theirs

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
